tool_description: Characters, locations, episodes from the show. </br> https://rickandmortyapi.com     </br>Sample query ```query { characters(page: 2, filter: { name: "rick" }) { info { count } results { name } } character(id: 1) { id } }```
name: Rick and Morty GraphQL
title: Rick and Morty GraphQL

api_list.name: graphQL
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://rick-and-morty-graphql.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rick-and-morty-graphql.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://rick-and-morty-graphql.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "rick-and-morty-graphql.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
